snippet: The strip club scene has been a staple of television, not to mention movies, for a long time, but increasingly it has become another boring cliché.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reflects that the strip club scene, which has become a staple of many television series, has increasingly become another boring cliche.
lead_paragraph: The strip club scene has been a staple of television, not to mention movies, for a long time, but increasingly it has become another boring cliché.

headline.seo: Stripping on TV: ‘House of Lies,’ ‘Revenge’ and Others
headline.main: Pole Dancing and Pasties Again? Get Me the Remote
headline.print_headline: Pole Dancing And Pasties Again? Get Me the Remote
